author: Gemini
description: This model focuses on recent changes in student engagement and performance to identify at-risk students before their overall grade drops significantly. It prioritizes assignment submission trends and recent attendance.

components.name: Grade Trend
components.calculation: Assigns risk based on the recent trend of the student's grade. Requires a column that calculates if the grade is 'Declining', 'Stagnant', or 'Improving'.

components.name: Assignment Velocity
components.calculation: Risk is calculated based on the number of missing assignments. A higher number of missing assignments significantly increases the risk score, scaled up to 35 points.

components.name: Recent Attendance
components.calculation: Assigns points for each day of absence within the last week, capping at 25 points for 5 or more days out.

components.name: Zero-Score Submissions
components.calculation: Adds 2 points of risk for each assignment submitted with a score of zero, capped at 10 points. This identifies students who are submitting empty or incomplete work.
